reasoning.step2:

- Evidence: Line " +10 % USt EUR 60,83" indicates 10% VAT applied.
- Formatting rule: percentage should be returned without "%" => "10".

Net.Amount (extracted: 608.26)

- Consistency: Net + VAT = Gross.
- Confidence: 99%

Vat.Amount (extracted: 60.83)
